trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wildwood
There were no other sightings in Wildwood on or around December 11th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi had gone into the walgreens store to buy some christmas lights. when i left the store about 5:08 pm on 12\11\12 to get in my car, i looked to my right (to the east) and noticed a formation of seven lights in the sky. at first i thought of helicopters but there was no sound and the lights were not white, they had a yellow orange glow. they were moving rapidly but i heard no sound. they were traveling to the north west. at their closest, they appeared to be spheres that glowed. they made no sound. another customer left the store. i pointed to the sky and asked him if he thought they were airplanes. he said no they were some sort of ufos. they were then out of sight and i got in my car at 5:16 pm and drove home. 12\12 i reported what i saw to the wildwood police and at their suggestion to the faa. i have good vision. i live near the spirit of st. louis airport and frequently watch aircraft during the day and night they pass over our home. i have never in my life saw anything like what i saw on 12\11\12.
